tool_description: Get the latest market moving Crypto news, aggregated and curated by industry leading Investing.com. Each news item has coin tags with icons allowing for easy user filtering and sorting. The database is updated every minute and each call pulls the latest pre-built data straight from the database allowing for fast page loads.
name: Crypto Pulse
title: Crypto Pulse

api_list.name: Get all latest crypto news
api_list.description: One end point, no pagination, just the latest potentially price sensitive crypto news over the last 24 hours.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-pulse.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-pulse.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-pulse.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-pulse.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
